SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_NM , M.PLANNER_NM , M.CNST_CHARG_NM , TO_CHAR(M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_START_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') MNTN_RPR_CNST_START_DT , TO_CHAR(M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') MNTN_RPR_CNST_END_DT , M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_AMT , M.RM , M.REG_USR , M.REGIST_DT , M.UPD_USR , M.UPDT_DT , M.CTRT_NO , (SELECT I.CTRT_NM FROM CTRT_INFO_F I WHERE I.CTRT_NO = M.CTRT_NO) CTRT_NM , M.FCLTS_JOB_SE , M.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , (SELECT G.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM FROM FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F G WHERE G.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = M.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM , M.MNTN_RPR_SEQ , M.MNTN_RPR_SE , GAM_GET_MNTN_RPR_SE_NM(M.MNTN_RPR_SE) MNTN_RPR_SE_NM , M.MNTN_RPR_PART , M.MNTN_RPR_CN , M.MNTN_RPR_BDGT , M.CNSTRTR , M.RESPON_ENGINEER , M.ENFORCE_YEAR FROM MNTN_RPR_DTLS_F M WHERE 1 = 1
AND M.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#
AND M.CTRT_NO = #sCtrtNo#
AND M.FCLTS_JOB_SE = #sFcltsJobSe#
AND M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_NM LIKE '%' || #sMntnRprCnstNm# || '%'
AND M.MNTN_RPR_SE = #sMntnRprSe#
AND ( M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_START_DT >= #sMntnRprCnstStartDtFr#
AND M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_START_DT <= #sMntnRprCnstStartDtTo#
)
ORDER BY M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_START_DT DESC ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) TOT_CNT FROM MNTN_RPR_DTLS_F M WHERE 1 = 1
AND M.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#
AND M.CTRT_NO = #sCtrtNo#
AND M.FCLTS_JOB_SE = #sFcltsJobSe#
AND M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_NM LIKE '%' || #sMntnRprCnstNm# || '%'
AND M.MNTN_RPR_SE = #sMntnRprSe#
AND ( M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_START_DT >= #sMntnRprCnstStartDtFr#
AND M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_START_DT <= #sMntnRprCnstStartDtTo#
)

SELECT M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_NM , M.PLANNER_NM , M.CNST_CHARG_NM , TO_CHAR(M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_START_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') MNTN_RPR_CNST_START_DT , TO_CHAR(M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') MNTN_RPR_CNST_END_DT , M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_AMT , M.RM , M.REG_USR , M.REGIST_DT , M.UPD_USR , M.UPDT_DT , M.CTRT_NO , (SELECT I.CTRT_NM FROM CTRT_INFO_F I WHERE I.CTRT_NO = M.CTRT_NO) CTRT_NM , M.FCLTS_JOB_SE , GAM_GET_FCLTS_JOB_SE_NM(M.FCLTS_JOB_SE) FCLTS_JOB_SE_NM , M.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , (SELECT G.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM FROM FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F G WHERE G.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = M.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO_NM , M.MNTN_RPR_SEQ , M.MNTN_RPR_SE , GAM_GET_MNTN_RPR_SE_NM(M.MNTN_RPR_SE) MNTN_RPR_SE_NM , M.MNTN_RPR_PART , M.MNTN_RPR_CN , M.MNTN_RPR_BDGT , M.CNSTRTR , M.RESPON_ENGINEER , M.ENFORCE_YEAR FROM MNTN_RPR_DTLS_F M WHERE M.FCLTS_JOB_SE = #fcltsJobSe# AND M.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND M.MNTN_RPR_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#mntnRprSeq#)

SELECT G.FCLTS_MNG_NO , G.PRT_FCLTY_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F G LEFT OUTER JOIN MNTN_RPR_OBJ_FCLTS_F O ON O.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = G.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO AND O.FCLTS_MNG_NO = G.FCLTS_MNG_NO WHERE 1=1
AND G.PRT_FCLTY_SE = #fcltsJobSe# AND G.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND O.MNTN_RPR_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#mntnRprSeq#)
ORDER BY O.FCLTS_MNG_NO ASC, G.PRT_FCLTY_NM ASC

SELECT FCLTS_JOB_SE , FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , MNTN_RPR_SEQ , ATCH_FILE_SEQ , ATCH_FILE_SE , GAM_GET_FILE_SE_NM(ATCH_FILE_SE) AS ATCH_FILE_SE_NM , ATCH_FILE_SJ , ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC , ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL , TO_CHAR(ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT , REG_USR , REGIST_DT , UPD_USR , UPDT_DT FROM MNTN_RPR_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_JOB_SE = #fcltsJobSe# AND FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND MNTN_RPR_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#mntnRprSeq#)
ORDER BY MNTN_RPR_SEQ ASC
